page.title: 06Computers
page.content: Computers have become an integral part of many of the{homes}in Loughton. The majority of them are used for games, one of the most popular at the moment being 'Chuckie Egg'. Computers are also used in{schools.}The BBC'B' in many of the local primary schools and the Linx 380Z at Epping Forest High School. CGL(Computer Games Ltd.) are makers of many of the small hand held games and one of the few electronical{businesses}in Loughton. One of our fathers is a{policeman}and the computer has made many changes to his job. With the press of a button on the keyboard he can call up a criminal record. Fingerprints can be checked against those of other criminals or he can check numberplates of stolen cars. Even different faces can be made up on a computer for an Identification Parade.
